Goal: why the heck not add this as a weight
TriforcePieces: To tweak, available pieces will be 1.5x the number needed
Players: Number of players if mode is multiworld
DistinctWorlds: If worlds are unique in Multiworld

TFGrassAllowed: How much Grass per pack is shuffled in MM TF without OW ER for balance, if you want no TF Grass, set to false
AdultInMM: Chance of Adult in MM being a setting
SongShuffle: Owls Statues and Songs can be shuffled amongst each other. Dungeon Rewards - every Boss Heart Container is a song, as well as Ice Cavern Song, Skull Kid Song, GTG Ice Arrow Chest, Bottom of the Well Lens Chest, not tested so may break! If songs fully anywhere, hints change to reveal key songs, and Song of Time becomes shared and not starting in MM, Hard Setting
GrassShuffle: Hard Setting if all, could be changed
WonderSpotShuffle: Hard Setting if also Freestanding and both all
SwordShuffle: Also affects Child Sword Upgrades, Hard Setting
FairyFountainShuffle: Includes Fat Fairy Spots in OoT
ButterflyShuffle: Butterflies, WIP, may be included as part of Fairy Fountain?
MMSkulltulaShuffle: Weights 1: No Dungeon Entrance Rando, Weights 2: Dungeon Entrance Rando, if 'cross', OoT 40 and 50 skulls no longer guaranteed junk
PrePlantedBeans: To keep an eye on, doesn't affect setting count, also adds Bean Seller to the pool
SkipChildZelda: Start with Prelude and Ocarina still, but now Zelda can have a random song/item, need Chicken to get, Chicken guaranteed hint, doesn't affect MysteryCount YET
MerchantShuffle: Affects all non-shop merchants and ALL Business scrubs, only happens alongside ShopShuffle
ChildWallet: Hard Setting if also ShopShuffle, doesn't affect Mystery Counter when alone
MaxWalletSize: Only rolls if Price Shuffle is Weighted or Fully Random
ProgressiveClockType: Need to balance weights for Ascending to work well
StartingClock: If not Night 3 clock, guaranteed hint added for Night 3
OwlShuffle: Weight 1: No Overworld Entrances Shuffled, Weight 2: Overworld Entrances Shuffled. Only rolled if SongShuffle isn't Mixed With Owls
OcarinaButtons: Weight 1: No SongShuffle, Weight 2: Full SongShuffle, Hard Settings
SoulShuffle: Shared Souls on, Hard Setting for any SoulShuffle
SilverRupeeShuffle: Hard Setting if with SmallKeysanity or BossKeysanity, not making it anywhere atm as I'd rather any dungeon when it exists
BossSoulsWeight: Weight 1: No BKeysanity, Weight 2: BKeysanity, Hard Setting
StrayFairyShuffle: Only Affects Freeflying fairies and CT Fairy
MQDungeonAmount: How many MQ dungeons weighted, not counted for settings as it may only roll precompleted dungeons
GibdoSettings: Weight 1: No Dungeon ER, Weight 2: Dungeon ER or Overworld ER
GanonTrialAmount: Amount of Trials for Ganon, Weight 1: No Castle Shuffle, Weight 2: Castle Shuffle, Hard Settings if more than 2 trials are on
TCGKeySettings: this is rolled if NOT full keysanity, else is 'anywhere', not affecting MysteryCount YET
KeyRingAmount: Weight 1: No TCG Key Shuffle, Weight 2: TCG Key Shuffle, only rolled if no Keysy settings for SKeys, also deliberately ignored WF and GB as they only have 1 key altogether, doesn't affect MysteryCount
SilverPouchAmount: 0 - 18, if the value is above the amount of Silver Pouches available due to MQ, it rerolls
As stated, if it goes above the amount of Silvers in the seed, it rerolls so yay. Also doesn't affect MysteryCount, only rolled if Silvers are NOT vanilla
KingZora: Weight 1: No Overworld ER, Weight 2: Overworld ER
ZoraDomainAdultShortcut: Weight 1: No Overworld ER, Weight 2: Overworld ER
DoorOfTime: Determines if you need SoT to open the Door of Time, doesn't affect Mystery Count YET
TimeTravelSword: Only rolls if Sword Shuffled, Weight 1: Door Of Time Open, Weight 2: Door Of Time Closed, this one I do not know how to balance weights for so WILL need changing
WorldEntranceRandomizer: Decoupled feels TOO chaotic for this setting but can be added, Hard Setting if not none or regions
WarpSongShuffle: Rolls if Owls and Warp Songs are NOT mixed together
DungeonEntranceShuffle: This also affects all minor dungeons and is cross game
GanonCastleShuffle: This only happens if Dungeon ER is on, if on Rainbow Bridge is open AND Ganon BK requires Medallions and Stones instead
GanonTowerShuffle: Only happens if Dungeon ER is on, if on Rainbow Bridge is Open and Ganon BK requires the Medallions and Stones instead
ClockTowerShuffle: This only happens if Dungeon ER is on
GrottoShuffle: Always cross game, also Xander's favourite setting :3

Allow: For the masochists, I have included Mixed Entrance Shuffle as a Mystery Setting too. By default this is off but I did check if it worked in the generator and it does

DecoupledEntrances: For the REAL masochists. God have mercy on those who touch this
AgelessAmount: Amount of Ageless Settings that can be chosen equally at random, doesn't affect Mystery Count
StartingEnemySoulPercentage: Percentage of Enemy Souls you start with, can add your own percentages and weights too!
StartingNPCSoulPercentage: Percentage of NPC Souls you start with, can add your own percentages and weights too!
GameplaySettings.Notes: ALL objects have Chest Appearance Matches Contents, this means cows, skulltulas, crates, snowballs, everything! Rules are the same as standard Blitz (base setting string is at 'DefaultString') bar what is randomized here. Post any suggestions to the github!
